exchange.description: The human readable name of the exchange

nativeInstrument.description: The identifying symbol of the instrument on the exchange

nativeBaseSymbol.description: The exchange specific symbol for the base asset of the instrument

nativeQuoteSymbol.description: The exchange specific symbol for the quote asset of the instrument

underlying.description: The symbol of the underlying asset for the instrument, for spot instruments this is generally the base asset

active.description: Indicates if the instrument is actively trading or not

limitsAmountMax.description: The maximum allowable trade amount for a single transaction in the native base asset units.

limitsAmountMin.description: The minimum allowable trade amount for a single transaction in the native base asset units.

limitsCostMax.description: The maximum allowable cost of a single trade in the native quote asset units.

limitsCostMin.description: The minimum allowable cost of a single trade in the native quote asset units.

limitsLeverageMax.description: The maximum leverage allowed for trading this instrument.

limitsLeverageMin.description: The minimum leverage allowed for trading this instrument.

limitsMarketMax.description: The maximum market exposure allowed per transaction for this instrument.

limitsMarketMin.description: The minimum market exposure required per transaction for this instrument.

limitsPriceMax.description: The maximum price limit for a transaction in the native quote asset units.

limitsPriceMin.description: The minimum price limit for a transaction in the native quote asset units.

precisionAmount.description: The number of decimal places that can be used for specifying the amount in a trade of this instrument.

precisionBase.description: The number of decimal places that can be used for the base asset amount in transactions.

precisionCost.description: The number of decimal places that can be used for the cost values in transactions of this instrument.

precisionPrice.description: The number of decimal places that can be used for pricing this instrument.

precisionQuote.description: The number of decimal places that can be used for the quote asset amount in transactions.

assetArcId.description: The permanent, unique identifier of the asset in ARC, that remains the same even if assetSymbol must change
